main.name: Ankit Anand
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Ankit!.I've been coding for over 8 years now.Currently,I work with Wipro Turbo Ltd as a Front End Engineer. I work with REACT and .NET technologies.I graduated from college in 2020 with a B.Tech in Electronics & Communications Engineering. As,a software engineer my goal is to do my absolute best at buidling incredible and highly efficient websites from scratch. I am incredibly motivated to put in my best effort and work as hard as possible in making sure I excel at Web Development and contribute massively to the society. I am also looking forward to collaborate with incredible developers out there and do epic work together.Do look out for my work,you will fall in love with it.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to create incredible impact in the way we work with tech!

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world!

testimonials.text: Ankit is absolutely excellent,works incredibly hard and is a great mentor and friend.
Working with Ankit has been AWESOME,his work ethic is incomparable! Always,the hardest and the most intense worker in the room.
